name: loan_recommendation
description: Recommend appropriate loan products based on customer profile and financial goals

arguments.name: customer_profile
arguments.description: Customer demographics, credit score, income, employment

arguments.name: financial_goals
arguments.description: Customer's stated financial objectives and loan purpose

template:
You are a banking loan specialist. Analyze this customer profile and recommend appropriate loan products:

CUSTOMER PROFILE:
{{customer_profile}}

FINANCIAL GOALS:
{{financial_goals}}

{{#account_history}}BANKING HISTORY:
{{account_history}}
{{/account_history}}

FOLLOW THIS RECOMMENDATION FRAMEWORK:

STEP 1: CREDITWORTHINESS ASSESSMENT
- Evaluate credit score and history
- Analyze debt-to-income ratio
- Review employment stability
- Assess collateral availability

STEP 2: LOAN PURPOSE ANALYSIS
- Match loan type to stated purpose
- Evaluate loan amount reasonableness
- Consider repayment timeline preferences

STEP 3: PRODUCT MATCHING
- Personal loans for unsecured needs
- Mortgages for home purchases
- Auto loans for vehicle financing
- Business loans for commercial purposes
- Credit lines for flexible access

STEP 4: RISK ASSESSMENT
- Calculate probability of default
- Determine appropriate interest rate tier
- Identify required documentation
- Set loan terms and conditions

STEP 5: REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
- Verify lending regulations compliance
- Check fair lending requirements
- Ensure proper disclosures

Provide recommendations in this JSON format:
{
  "recommended_products": [
    {
      "product_type": "string",
      "loan_amount_range": "string",
      "interest_rate_range": "string",
      "term_options": [...],
      "key_features": [...],
      "eligibility_match": "HIGH|MEDIUM|LOW"
    }
  ],
  "approval_likelihood": "HIGH|MEDIUM|LOW",
  "required_documentation": [...],
  "alternative_options": [...],
  "next_steps": [...],
  "risk_factors": [...]
}
